name: Ext_R4B_PlanDefinition_ac_code
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.PlanDefinition.action.code for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents PlanDefinition.action.code from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PlanDefinition|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Code representing the meaning of the action or sub-actions
element.definition: A code that provides a meaning, grouping, or classification for the action or action group. For example, a section may have a LOINC code for the section of a documentation template. In pharmaceutical quality, an action (Test) such as pH could be classified as a physical property.
element.comment: `PlanDefinition.action.code` maps to R5 `PlanDefinition.action.code`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Code representing the meaning of the action or sub-actions

element.comment: `PlanDefinition.action.code` maps to R5 `PlanDefinition.action.code`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Provides examples of actions to be performed.
